campaign_context.description: An outreach initiative to connect with Series-A founders in the FinTech space to discuss decentralized finance trends and explore potential advisory board synergies.
campaign_context.why_approaching: Goal is Schedule a 15-minute virtual coffee chat to discuss industry headwinds and potentially invite them to our private founder's slack community.. Initial context: I recently read your whitepaper on cross-border payments and noticed we share several mutual connections in the Ethereum Alliance. Target Industry: Financial Technology (FinTech) / Blockchain
